name: Bumble Trouble
description:
It’s a race against time to guide Bumble the bee around the level and collect all of the honeycombs in this epic backyard adventure! Do you have what it takes to collect all of the honeycombs and return to the hive before the time runs out?

THE BASICS
Fly through honeycombs to collect them and earn points!
Collect all the honeycombs before the timer runs out!
Look for hidden secrets that give you extra time!

CONTROLS
Hold the “Fly” button to move forward.
Move your finger around the screen to control the camera.

FEATURES
Fast and fun gameplay!
Suitable for players of all ages!
Intuitive virtual button controls!
Beautifully-realized 3D environment!
Cute and bouncy soundtrack!
